import { Card } from '@site/src/components/shared/Card'
import { CardContainer } from '@site/src/components/shared/CardContainer'

# ✨ Robo Templates

We have a collection of templates that you can use to kickstart your project or just use as a reference. Each one is designed to help you get started with **Robo.js** quickly and show what's possible.

Want to contribute your own? Submit a pull request!

<CardContainer>
	<Card
		href="https://github.com/Wave-Play/robo.js/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md"
		title="📝 Contributing"
		description="How to contribute to Robo.js"
	/>
</CardContainer>

## Discord Activities

**[Discord Activities](../discord-activities/getting-started)** are web apps that run inside Discord and can be built using **[HTML](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP)**, **[CSS](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS)**, and **[JavaScript](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript)**. They use Discord's **[Embedded App SDK](https://github.com/discord/embedded-app-sdk/)** to interact with Discord APIs.

### Starters

<CardContainer>
	<Card
		href="https://github.com/Wave-Play/robo.js/tree/main/templates/starter-activity-javascript"
		title="🔗 Starter Vanilla (JS)"
		description="A basic JavaScript template without any UI libraries."
	/>
	<Card
		href="https://github.com/Wave-Play/robo.js/tree/main/templates/starter-activity-typescript"
		title="🔗 Starter Vanilla (TS)"
		description="A basic TypeScript template without any UI libraries."
	/>
	<Card
		href="https://github.com/Wave-Play/robo.js/tree/main/templates/starter-app-js-react"
		title="🔗 Starter React (JS)"
		description="A basic JavaScript template using React."
	/>
	<Card
		href="https://github.com/Wave-Play/robo.js/tree/main/templates/starter-app-ts-react"
		title="🔗 Starter React (TS)"
		description="A basic TypeScript template using React."
	/>
</CardContainer>

		description="A music player proxying external audio using React."
	/>

		description="A basic TypeScript template using Tailwind and shadcn."
	/>
</CardContainer>

## Discord Apps

**[Discord Apps](../discord-bots/getting-started)** are bots that run inside Discord and can be built using **[JavaScript](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript)** or **[TypeScript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/)**. They use **[Discord.js](https://discord.js.org/)** to interact with Discord APIs.

### Starters

<CardContainer>
	<Card
		href="https://github.com/Wave-Play/robo.js/tree/main/templates/starter-bot-javascript"
		title="🔗 Starter (JS)"
		description="A basic JavaScript bot using Robo.js."
	/>
	<Card
		href="https://github.com/Wave-Play/robo.js/tree/main/templates/starter-bot-typescript"
		title="🔗 Starter (TS)"
		description="A basic TypeScript bot using Robo.js."
	/>
</CardContainer>

### Miscellaneous

<CardContainer>
	<Card
		href="https://github.com/Wave-Play/robo.js/tree/main/templates/bot-mongodb-ts"
		title="🔗 MongoDB (TS)"
		description="A bot using MongoDB and TypeScript."
	/>
	<Card
		href="https://github.com/Wave-Play/robo.js/tree/main/templates/bot-postgres-ts"
		title="🔗 PostgreSQL (TS)"
		description="A bot using PostgreSQL and TypeScript."
	/>
	<Card
		href="https://github.com/Wave-Play/robo.js/tree/main/templates/bot-prisma-ts"
		title="🔗 Prisma (TS)"
		description="A bot using Prisma ORM and TypeScript."
	/>
	<Card
		href="https://github.com/Wave-Play/robo.js/tree/main/templates/discord-bots/purrth-vader"
		title="🔗 Purrth Vader (TS)"
		description="A user-installable AI companion."
	/>
</CardContainer>

### Community Templates

<CardContainer>
	<Card
		href="https://github.com/Wave-Play/robo.js/tree/main/templates/economy-bot"
		title="🔗 Economy (TS)"
		description="An economy bot using Robo.js."
	/>
</CardContainer>

## Web Apps

Standalone web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, running in the browser and on the server. They can be built using **[HTML](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP)**, **[CSS](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS)**, and **[JavaScript](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript)**.

### Starters

<CardContainer>
	<Card
		href="https://github.com/Wave-Play/robo.js/tree/main/templates/starter-webapp-javascript"
		title="🔗 Starter (JS)"
		description="A basic JavaScript web app using Robo.js."
	/>
	<Card
		href="https://github.com/Wave-Play/robo.js/tree/main/templates/starter-webapp-typescript"
		title="🔗 Starter (TS)"
		description="A basic TypeScript web app using Robo.js."
	/>
</CardContainer>

<br />

:::tip

**Made something awesome?** Don't forget to host it so others can use it too!

Check out our **[Hosting Overview](../hosting/overview)** to learn how.

:::
